column3: Lancashire School of Business and Enterprise
column5: On our International Business and Management course you’ll gain the key skills, knowledge and competences to be successful in the world of international business. Through the master’s dissertation you’ll personalise your programme to reflect your interests and career aspirations.This course is being reapproved under the University’s normal cycle of review.  As such, the course structure and content may be changed to enable the University to deliver a better quality of educational experience to studentsYou’ll study the practice of international management, at the operational and strategic levels, and how international labour markets operate as well as developments in practices associated with employment relations.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 3 years part time
